column4: looks like i'm gonna have to boot up windows, wine wont' even use the software on the dvd
what app ya trying to run?
what version of wine do you have?
not an app, actually, a DVD
and the most recent version of wine
Video DVD?
there is software on the dvd, so i'm assuming the app might provide some sort of decryptor
and yes, video dvd
is it embedded Video software or actual windows software?
Xfiles - Season 4
it's actual windows software
Then what's totem's problem that it's chokin' on it?
it might be that the software itself has runtime DRM attached
the DRM is beyond annoying.......................
i'm trying that now
ton of vobs, sorting through them now
I once had audio files from musicmatch that used runtime DRM to tell me I didn't have licenses that I've purchased, and other time it would tell me that I don't have the correct player.
it sucked
i'm sick of the DRM stuff.
it's just more stuff to force us to microsoft, they're not really worried about us or the people who make the dvds
Microsoft is just using them to control us
DRM, good Idea, poor implementation
